judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed, each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Marvin Comisky, with him Goneer M. Krestal, and Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellants.
Edward R. Becker, with him Peter O. Clause, Ellis A. Horwitz and William A. Meehan, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
McLaughlin v. Osser, Appellant.
Argued October 12, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Marvin Comisky, with him Goneer M. Krestal, and Blank, Rudenko, Klaus & Rome, for appellants.
Edward R. Becker, with him Peter O. Clause, Ellis A. Horwitz and William A. Meehan, for appellee.
October 18, 1965:
